author: Source: Madison Publishing
title: Canadians hoping for one-way trip to Mars welcome news of liquid water - Madison Publishing
text:
Johanna Hindle, a British Columbia high-school teacher, is one of six Canadians who remain in the running in the plan by Mars One, a Dutch-based organization, to establish a colony on Mars by 2027. THE CANADIAN PRESS/HO Johanna Hindle, a British Columbia high-school teacher, is one of six Canadians who remain in the running in the plan by Mars One, a Dutch-based organization, to establish a colony on Mars by 2027.
 Madison Publishing.
